Text:
COMMENTERS;PLEASE,NO SPOILERS!!!!!!!.
Footy,im watching your downloads from the sunny hils of L.A.....thank you soso much,i really mean it.

thanks a lot footy!! i dont have a broadcasting channel on my tv...so i will be downloading all ur torrents through out the tournament :)

Keep up the great work!....and thanks also for no spoilers in the description :D

cheers!

your uploads are sooooooooooo awesome!

Now that EURO is at the same time as Formula 1 I can count on you to upload the race. Normally I would watch the race live, but Croatia is playing, so this thank you is coming from Croatia

Man, when someone uploads some awesome stuff, in my book that's love!


And, just wondering, will you be uploading full matches? Because I'm curious how other commentators cover it and stuff
